text: Goodsprings is a census-designated place in Clark County, Nevada, United States. The population of Goodsprings was 162 at the 2020 census. Goodsprings was featured in the video game, Fallout: New Vegas where it is the first place the player wakes up in. ==References== ==Other websites== *Goodsprings Historical Society Category:Census-designated places in Nevada Category:Unincorporated communities in Nevada
title: Goodsprings, Nevada
